ovdesc.p: This application offers the user a quick and easy way to check which prices require updating before the end of exchange processes are run.

desc.p: This is the key for this particular record.
This field shows the currently running process (if currently running) for this instance of price generation. System generated field only.
This is the time at which the prices were generated from this DX.RV.CHECK.PRICES record. System-generated field only.
This is the date (system date) on which the prices were generated from this DX.RV.CHECK.PRICES record. System-generated field only.

Price set to be used when generating prices. This is defaulted to 'CLOSING' or 'CURRENT' when [Price Set] is set to 'End of Exchange' or 'Online', respectively. However, if [Price Set] is set to 'Other', a price set must be specified. Must be a record key for a valid record in the DX.PRICE.SET table.
Errors found (if any). This is a system-generated field only.
Determines the price set to be used when generating prices.
This can be set to 'End of Exchange', 'Online' or 'Other'.
To use closing prices as set by exchange, use 'End of Exchange'. To use intra-day 'online' prices, use 'Online'.
Alternatively, to use theoretical or 'what if' prices, use 'Other', then specify the price set to use in the [Alt Price Set] field.
